name: Anatomical Heart - Solid Sterling Silver - Handmade - Rickson Original Unique Design - International
description:
Travel to the center of your emotional being with this hand carved, sterling silver heart. I hand make each one and add red cords that travel in and out of your heart's ventricles. 

This is an amazing combination of biology and symbolic representation that creates a stunning piece of wearable art. Makes a beautiful gift, especially for those in the medical industry or loved ones who appreciate a modern take on a classic symbol of love and emotions.

I ship internationally and you recieve a tracking number. This piece arrives in a gift bag with a hand made gift card and is made to order. Please allow 1-2 weeks for production. Order by Feb.1st for Valentines day delivery. 

It measures 1.5 x 1.5 " (2.5 x 2.5 cm) and has sterling silver clasps and a 2" length of chain at the end of the elastic cord, so the necklace is adjustable and goes from 15" - 17" to accomodate varying necklines and personal style. 

I am honoured to say this piece has recieved critical aclaim from artists, professors and jewellery lovers. I appreciate your praise. 

I hope you enjoy it, 

Rickson 
www.RicksonJewelry.bigcartel.com
RicksonJewellery@yahoo.ca

name: Irish Claddagh Ring - Solid sterling silver - Handmade - Rickson Design - Any size - Traditional Cel
description:
Claddagh rings are traditional Irish Promise rings, but this hand carved sterling silver ring is far from conventional. I designed this unique version and sculpted it from wax and then cast it in sterling silver. Most claddagh rings have hands holding a heart with the thumb and forefinger. But this ring has two hands gently cupping the heart, making it a heart felt image of love and tradition.

Available in all sizes, this ring makes a beautiful gift for yourself, a lover, or a friend. I am guilty of making one for myself. :)

I ship internationally and you recieve a tracking number. Your new ring arrives in a gift bag with a hand made gift card and make each ring to order so please allow 2 weeks for production. Order by Feb.1st for Valentines Day delivery. 

I hope you enjoy it.

Customer Feedback:

"I absolutely adore my Claddagh ring!...I've been looking for just the right treasure to wear that connects me to the bold and beautiful spirit of my beloved gran whose family emigrated to the US from County Cork. Your wonderful creation is absolutely perfect! Thank you for sharing your amazing talent, and for providing me with such a lovely link to the 'loyalty, love and friendship' that so signified my gran. Please know it will be worn with love.

Many blessings to you!"

Rickson 
www.RicksonArt.blogspot.com
RicksonJewellery@yahoo.ca

name: Your Song Ring - Solid sterling silver - Custom - Personalized Music Ring - Size 4 - 15 available -
description:
Ever had a song that meant the world to you? Or do you and your loved one have a song? Turn your most precious song into a precious ring. This piece was created for my aunt as a present for her husband. Their song, 'I will always love you' is carved into this ring with the music notes on the outside and lyrics engraved on the inside.

How to Order
Simply purchase this ring. Then email me at: RicksonJewellery@yahoo.ca.
Write in the email your choice of:
- Song title
- Engraving for inside: max 20 characters 

Your special ring will be made in your size, with the REAL notes to your choice of song, AND your special engraving! Such a unique and special gift. 

I ship internationally and you get a tracking number so you can trust your new ring will arrive in time for your special event. Allow two weeks for production, order by Feb. 1st for Valentines day delivery. Your new ring arrives in a gift bag with a hand made gift card. 

Gift Ideas: Whether you have a birthday, anniversary, wedding or graduation a personalized song ring makes a beautiful and thoughtful gift. It's especially well suited for music enthusiasts, musicians, song writers and loved ones with whom you share a special song. Makes a wonderful keep sake for any event you wish to remember because it is solid sterling silver and hand crafted to last for years to come. 

*******Customer Feedback*******

"I gave this ring to my daughter who was so touched by it she cried. Rickson took such great care in doing a perfect job. I was so impressed by her sincere interest in making it special. The ring was even more beautiful in person. Thank you Rickson for giving our family an heirloom that we will always cherish."

Enjoy and thank you for your interest! 

Rickson
www.RicksonArt.blogspot.com
RicksonJewellery@yahoo.ca
